title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. I, pt. 570 - Introduction; Definitions used in these Regulations

State Regulations
§ 570.1 - Statutes administered by the agency
§ 570.2 - Organization of these regulations
§ 570.3 - Definitions used in these regulations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. I, pt. 570

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§15-2709, 24-0805, 24-0903; art. 15, title 27; art. 24; Executive

Law, §§804, 809; art. 27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
